TopicTitle: [WIP] Never Enuff Dakka:- A BDArmory expansion [Release 3]

Articles.Content:
> 
> Yes, ever heard of Flan's mod? Has about every damn tank going.
> Sadly that KV-2 model was never released, I just know the guy who made it, but there is another KV-2 out there.

I haven't really played Minecraft in a while myself, and last time I did Flan's Mod the 2 ingame tanks were just retextures of the same model.

> 
> I haven't really played Minecraft in a while myself, and last time I did Flan's Mod the 2 ingame tanks were just retextures of the same model.

Yeah, we fired Flan as a modeller and made our own. There's also a tonne of 3rd party packs now.

I've noticed that the turrets sometimes do not respond to the BD Armory weapon selection or the Toggle Turret button, and whenever I turn the turret off it rattles. A lot. Dunno if this is just an isolated case. Anybody here experiencing the same problem?

Edit: seems like it's just the Challenger turret that does that a lot.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-21T02:57:51Z" title="05/21/2015 02:57  AM" data-short="9 yr">May 21, 2015</time> by feriofukada**

> 
> I've noticed that the turrets sometimes do not respond to the BD Armory weapon selection or the Toggle Turret button, and whenever I turn the turret off it rattles. A lot. Dunno if this is just an isolated case. Anybody here experiencing the same problem?
> Edit: seems like it's just the Challenger turret that does that a lot.

I'm aware of the rattling, but can't work out what causes it, some turrets are fine, some rattle, and I can't work out why they are doing it.

> 
> I'm aware of the rattling, but can't work out what causes it, some turrets are fine, some rattle, and I can't work out why they are doing it.

Node sizes?

Download link just sends me to an ad page after mediafire and never actually begins the file download. \*glares over top of glasses\*

Update: Got it to work. Now off to finally make a SheVa Nine... well... once I install TweakScale. xD

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-22T01:29:23Z" title="05/22/2015 01:29  AM" data-short="9 yr">May 22, 2015</time> by Kagame**
Proto, I have an awesome request for you, We need...... the Guntank turret --->![F5tW1yf.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/F5tW1yf.jpg) The SPAAG Gun from the Type-87

Or the Gepard or Shilka maybe? A shilka would be ....ing terrifying to fly against. A leopard chassis would not go amiss either! And since I'm on a roll at the moment, a pre-loaded SAM turret such as the Russian SA-8 or the Euro Roland. Well, that's my roll for the time being. i could go on, but I don't want to throw too much stuff at you guys.

Follow up to that previous post, kind of not really. Does anybody know what kind of development we can be expecting for any boat mods? The oto melara and bofors naval guns would be perfect, as would prometheus' RIM-174 and RGM-84 for that development, and I wait for the day where I can have combat on the high seas of kerbin.

> 
> Proto, I have an awesome request for you, We need...... the Guntank turret --->[http://i.imgur.com/F5tW1yf.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/F5tW1yf.jpg) The SPAAG Gun from the Type-87

M113 chassis and M163 turret would be nice as well.

![M163_VADS.JPEG](https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/7/7a/M163_VADS.JPEG)

Not intended to be a gimme pig. I love your work, though. It helps me channel my inner Wargame: EE/ALB/RD into KSP.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-23T03:11:37Z" title="05/23/2015 03:11  AM" data-short="9 yr">May 23, 2015</time> by General Rarity**
Holy ...., same here. Honestly I've been crossing Wargame ALB and KSP more than is probably healthy.
Every time I try to load KSP or access the VAB with this mod, it crashes for some reason, anyone else having that issue?

Guntank is totally the coolest. Forged from the fires of hell, with only the greatest of Nippon Steel. A Swiss Design perfected with Japanese Enthusiasm.

- - - Updated - - -

> 
> Follow up to that previous post, kind of not really. Does anybody know what kind of development we can be expecting for any boat mods? The oto melara and bofors naval guns would be perfect, as would prometheus' RIM-174 and RGM-84 for that development, and I wait for the day where I can have combat on the high seas of kerbin.

I've Tried to build proto a platform for his naval guns, sadly though im sort of scared because the most recent Land Platform i built for him (smooth and curvy tank one the Falcon is mounted on) is Damn near indestructible. and also if i got a boat working it wouldn't look the best or be the biggest. i don't have the hardware to support that much water physics. However i did make him a slightly unstable (only breaks the Time/Space Continuum if you smash it into anything) Land Battleship platform somewhat inspired by the ratte. i will look around for alternatives. but for now he wont be doing any naval guns for a while. hes mostly working on Flans mod stuff, and his own custom part pack.

> 
> M113 chassis and M163 turret would be nice as well.
> Not intended to be a gimme pig. I love your work, though. It helps me channel my inner Wargame: EE/ALB/RD into KSP.

I never thought I'd see a fellow WG player on a different forum
Bumpin' Because Dennis Hype. If you are reading this Dennis thanks for using the pack. we look forward to more Shenanigans from you!.
PrototypeTheta I assume the KV-2 shoots Pure Stalinium, Right?
Iosef Stalinium is the core Component of the KV-2 cannonshells they are super dense and Feature Physics altering technology,.

Please make battleship cannons ;-;

I really just want a triple 203MM mount, and a triple 406MM mount for making proper tweakscale battleships.
Say just stumbled acros your part pack and I was woundering what that fuselage you mounted a few of the guns on was some sort of mod?
Kerbal Foundries, same mod that gives you the tank tracks.

> 
> I never thought I'd see a fellow WG player on a different forum

Two WG players actually...
the AS90 155mm howitser turret is not loading its texture, it appears completely white in-game. good pack though.
Eh, it does that to me too, as well as some other parts from various other mods, sometimes if you relaunch the game you don't have that problem.
Could you possibly rip the monsters Quadcannon from its back and mount it to a giant turret?
... I'll think about that when Monster is finished.
